message: The SDG_TARGET field for indicator 4-4-1, translated into all languages

data.en: 4.4 By 2030, substantially increase the number of young people and adults who have relevant skills, including technical and professional skills, for employment, decent work and entrepreneurship.
data.pt: 4.4 Até 2030, aumentar substancialmente o número de jovens e adultos que tenham habilidades relevantes, inclusive competências técnicas e profissionais, para emprego, trabalho decente e empreendedorismo.
